episodes.title: Episode 39: Burning Butterflies Podcast Host Shares Her Story: Leaving a Cult
episodes.description: Disclaimer: Not all of the views, beliefs, and core values expressed by guests on this podcast necessarily reflect the view, beliefs, and core values of Liza Lovett or the Warriors Community. I've mentioned a podcast I discovered a few months ago on the podcast before. And now I have one of the podcast hosts joining me today! Amanda Turnbull is co-host of the Burning Butterflies Podcast where she and her co-host talk about their journey through a cult. They start at the very beginning and take you through it all! When I first listened to the Burning Butterflies podcast, I was amazed at how deeply I could relate to each episode. Today, Amanda shares part of her story about her experience in a cult and how she disentangled her beliefs once she left. Link to the Burning Butterflies Patreon Link to the Book Referred to in Today's Episode: Recovering Agency: Lifting the Veil of Mormon Mind Control Join the ⁠⁠⁠The Warriors Community Patreon⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ for weekly updates on the ongoing case against the cult I was in, along with deeper conversations and a chance to create and interact with me and a community of people. ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ If you have any questions or comments about today's episode, please feel free to reach out and chat! You can find me on instagram at ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠@⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Mrs. Liza Lovett⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ . subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Episode 37: Questions to Help Determine What is and Isn't a Cult
episodes.description: Disclaimer: Not all of the views, beliefs, and core values expressed by guests on this podcast necessarily reflect the view, beliefs, and core values of Liza Lovett or the Warriors Community. The last two weeks, we have focused a lot on the BITE Model, which is a resource that is extremely helpful for anyone who has been involved in cultish environments. Today, I go over a list of questions from Dr. Steven Hassans. (who developed the BITE model) to help determine whether or not you are in a cultish environment. episodes.title: Episode 36: My Story - What Made me Vulnerable to a Cult
episodes.description: Disclaimer: Not all of the views, beliefs, and core values expressed by guests on this podcast necessarily reflect the view, beliefs, and core values of Liza Lovett or the Warriors Community. I want to go back. I mean way back! And share with you some personal experiences that put me at risk for joining a cult. I will also share with you some resources to help you identify what may put you at risk. And, I share some characteristics of cults to look for when joining a new church or other organization. Link to the websites referred to in this podcast: What Puts Someone at Risk ACES Test The BITE Model Join the The Warriors Community Patreon⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ for weekly updates on the ongoing case against the cult I was in, along with deeper conversations and a chance to create and interact with me and a community of people. ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ If you have any questions or comments about today's episode, please feel free to reach out and chat!
